action_items.task: Create a survey for feedback, including ratings and open-ended questions.
Implement a feedback widget for direct bug reporting in the app.
Work with marketing to send out beta invitations.
Draft installation instructions for iOS and Android.
Coordinate and schedule the midpoint check-in video call with testers.
Create a system for categorizing and tracking feedback.

decisions.context: To gather initial feedback on the mobile app.
decisions.decision: Start beta testing with 100 users (mix of iOS and Android).

decisions.context: To allow sufficient time for testers to provide feedback.
decisions.decision: The beta testing period will be two weeks.

decisions.context: To ensure comprehensive feedback on the app's essential aspects.
decisions.decision: Testers will focus on core functionality, navigation, main features, UI, and overall experience.

decisions.context: To collect organized feedback from testers.
decisions.decision: A structured feedback form will be created.

decisions.context: To streamline bug reporting from testers.
decisions.decision: A feedback widget will be integrated into the app for direct bug reporting.

decisions.context: To ensure testers can easily install the beta on their respective platforms.
decisions.decision: Separate installation instructions for iOS and Android will be included in the invitations.

decisions.context: To address any issues early and gather real-time feedback.
decisions.decision: A midpoint check-in with testers will be scheduled.

decisions.context: To efficiently manage and analyze the feedback received.
decisions.decision: A system for categorizing and tracking feedback will be created.

key_points: Focus areas for testing (core functionality, UI/UX)
Feedback collection methods (structured form, in-app widget)
summary.tldr: The team finalized the plan for the mobile app beta test, which will involve 100 users and run for two weeks starting November 12th. Key functionalities and UI/UX will be the focus, with structured feedback mechanisms and a midpoint check-in scheduled.

tasks_created.title: Create a survey for feedback, including ratings and open-ended questions.
Implement a feedback widget for direct bug reporting in the app.
Work with marketing to send out beta invitations.
Draft installation instructions for iOS and Android.
Coordinate and schedule the midpoint check-in video call with testers.
Create a system for categorizing and tracking feedback.
